page.title: 10MEDICAL CARE,STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: { { { GENERAL}PATIENTS ATTEND SURGERY TO CONSULT ABOUT ILLNESS,PROBLEMS AND WORRIES.IF UNABLE TO ATTEND SURGERY PATIENTS MAY HAVE A HOME VISIT AT THE DISCRETION OF THE DOCTOR. {CONTRACEPTION}PATIENTS MAY OBTAIN FAMILY PLANNING ADVICE AT NORMAL SURGERY OR A SPECIAL CLINIC WHICH IS HELD FORTNIGHTLY. {MATERNITY}ANTE-NATAL AND POST-NATAL CLINICS ARE PROVIDED BUT ACTUAL DELIVERY OF BABIES ONLY IN CASES OF EMERGENCY.ANTE-NATAL CLINICS ARE HELD TWICE WEEKLY. {OTHER CLINICS}IMMUNISATION AND PROBLEM CLINIC FOR PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN.PAEDIATRIC DEVELOPMENTAL ASSESSMENT.MINOR SURGERY. {THE PRACTICE}5 DOCTORS SERVE 15000 PEOPLE OF WHICH 11000 LIVE IN TOWN.
